snippet.title: Manny's (2023) Game Trailer
snippet.description:
OUT NOW ON STEAM AND ITCH!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2518900/Mannys/
https://thebonemeal.itch.io/mannys

Manny's is a story-focused psychological horror game about a starving cast away on a deserted island who comes to realize that a fully stocked, fully functional fast food restaurant appears on the island once the sun sets.

As if beckoning him in his most desperate hour of need, he traipses into the restaurant, fully unprepared for the horrors that await him.

How did this restaurant get here? Is this real or is it some fever dream? Something far below the restaurant calls out, but some secrets are better left buried.

With three separate endings, a fishing mini-game, and enough thrills and chills around every corner, Manny's is sure to have you coming back for more.

While still in development, we hope to see you real soon.

Visit our community page!
https://steamcommunity.com/groups/bonemealproductions

Developed by Bonesaw577 with Bonemeal Productions.
Follow the Bonemeal Twitter for the latest news: https://twitter.com/Bonemeal_

Very special thank you to Molly Nemecek (mollyartwork) for her incredible Manny's logos and artwork and Jordan Indiana Gonzalez (indyfullstop) for his musical contributions to the game.

Visit my site!
https://www.thebonemeal.com
